​
​The vertical motion of the tip of a needle on a sewing machine is periodic with respect to time and can be modeled by a sinusoidal function. The figure shows the location of the tip of the needle in relation to a cloth plate. The tip of the needle moves straight up and down above and below the cloth plate. The table gives a consecutive maximum and minimum displacement of the tip at two times. The function <math alttext="d"><semantics><mi>d</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> models the displacement, in centimeters, of the tip of the needle from the cloth plate at time <math alttext="t"><semantics><mi>t</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, in seconds. Which of the following expressions could define <math alttext="d open parentheses t close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>d</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="2.5 cos open parentheses 1 over 12 t close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mn>2.5</mn><mi>cos</mi><mfenced><mrow><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>12</mn></mfrac><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>​

​<math alttext="2.5 cos open parentheses pi over 6 t close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mn>2.5</mn><mi>cos</mi><mfenced><mrow><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>6</mn></mfrac><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>
